title: Academic Institutions || Sports Authority of India
content: Academic Institutions || Sports Authority of India Cancel Preloader 0 Sports Authority of India Introduction Two academic institutions, one each in the field of sports coaching and physical education, are functioning under SAI, namely the Netaji Subhas National Institute of Sports (NSNIS), Patiala and the Lakshmibai National College of Physical Education (LNCPE), Thiruvananthapuram. Sports Authority of India Academic Institutions Netaji Subhas National Institute of Sports, Patiala More Information Lakshmibai National College of Physical Education (LNCPE), Thiruvananthapuram More Information
